Por exemplo, para a cultura en-US, a cadeia de caracteres retornada pode aparecer como `{ {M11:1.1 M12:1.2 M13:1.3 M14:1.4} {M21:2.1 M22:2.2 M23:2.3 M24:2.4} {M31:3.1 M32:3.2 M33:3.3 M34:3.4} {M41:4.1 M42:4.2 M43:4.3 M44:4.4} }`.For example, for the en-US culture, the returned string might appear as `{ {M11:1.1 M12:1.2 M13:1.3 M14:1.4} {M21:2.1 M22:2.2 M23:2.3 M24:2.4} {M31:3.1 M32:3.2 M33:3.3 M34:3.4} {M41:4.1 M42:4.2 M43:4.3 M44:4.4} }`.
